tradition: Tantric chakra-planet correspondences (Bihar School of Yoga lineage) with modern psychological interpretation.
sources: Satyananda Saraswati, Swami. Kundalini Tantra. Bihar School of Yoga, 1984.
Judith, Anodea. Wheels of Life: A User's Guide to the Chakra System. Llewellyn Publications, 1987.

chakras.notes: Survival, grounding, and physical security emphasis per Judith's exposition of Muladhara (Ch. 3).
Fluidity, sensuality, and emotional regulation anchored in bodily waters (Judith, Ch. 4).
Personal power, self-definition, and vitality per Judith's Manipura profile (Ch. 5).
Love, relational balance, and devotional presence outlined in Judith's heart chakra chapter (Ch. 6).
Expression, resonance, and subtle ether harmonics emphasised by Judith (Ch. 7).
Perception, insight, and disciplined attention summarised in Judith's Ajna discussion (Ch. 8).
Transcendence, integration, and spiritual union described in Judith's crown chakra synthesis (Ch. 9).
